Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/1/1970 to a minor league contract.
Drafted in 3rd round, 58th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1971...
Injured on 7/8/1973 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1978, off Dave Goltz (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1978, off Gary Nolan (PIT)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1978...
Injured on 4/24/1980 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/26/1980 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to NYM: C J. Wockenfuss. Going to CHC: 3B R. Knight)...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1981...
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by California in 1987...
Injured on 8/11/1988 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/6/1989 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/24/1991 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1992 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 9/5/1992 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/3/1995 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from California to Boston on 1/31/1996 (Going to CAL: P J. Jacome. Going to BOS: SS J. Offerman)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1996, off Wilson Alvarez (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/1996, off Scott Garrelts (DET)...
